name: A Terminal Download Application
body:
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2152766/5695059/8299ab66-9984-11e4-87d6-bddd375eb1f6.png)

### A Terminal Download Application

Download *any* file off the internet! Wow!

**Latest version (1.13.1)**

- [Download 32-bit](http://google.com)
- [Download 64-bit](http://google.com)

#### Tutorial

```bash
$ lc_download
Please enter a URL
$ lc_download http://example.com/file.png
$ ./file.png
```

- [Documentation](http://google.com)
- [Support]((http://google.com))
- [Chat](https://gitter.im/learnclang/general)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
